arm_group.description: The control group will be constituted of patients with the prosthesis GMK ® without the ancillary MyKnee ® LBS.
The treated group  will consist of patients which the  GMK ® prosthesis with ancillary ® MyKnee LBS.

brief_summary.textblock:
Over 70.000 total knee arthroplasty (TKA) are performed in France every year, with a 10%
      yearly increase since the early 1990s. The clinical experience shows a strong rate of
      success on pain relief and on function. Longevity of the implants has been shown to be
      determined by the biomechanical design of the prosthesis, and by the implantation technique,
      especially the correct positioning of the bone cuts during the surgery. To improve the
      precision of these cuts, the patient matched cutting blocks developed by Medacta allow to
      adapt the bone cuts to the patient's anatomy, improving the reliability of this procedure. A
      reduction of the surgery time lengh and bleeding would be other benefits expected with this
      type of ancillary. The objective of this trial is to study the reliability of patient
      matched cutting blocks for total knee arthroplasty, by both clinical and radiological
      assessment, the effect on morbidity reduction during and after the procedure and also the
      benefit it could bring on an economic point of view.

clinical_study.brief_title: Medico-economic Interest of the Patient Matched Cutting Blocks (Ancillary) MyKnee ® LBS During the Poses of Complete Prosthesis of Knee GMK ®. Multicentric, Prospective, Controlled, Opened, Randomised Study About a Medical Device.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        all patients requiring a total knee arthroplasty line: primary or secondary osteoarthritis
        advanced beyond medical treatment.

        Exclusion Criteria:

        distorded axes or laxity requiring the establishment of constrained prosthesis

intervention.intervention_name: the prosthesis GMK ® without the ancillary MyKnee ® LBS
Matched patient cutting blocks MyKnee ® LBS

clinical_study.official_title: Medico-economic Interest of the Patient Matched Cutting Blocks (Ancillary) MyKnee ® LBS During the Poses of Complete Prosthesis of Knee GMK ®. Multicentric, Prospective, Controlled, Opened, Randomised Study About a Medical Device.

oversight_info.authority: France: Committee for the Protection of Personnes

primary_outcome.description: The evaluation will use a specific score for total knee arthroplasty: Part of the Knee Society function score (KSS) measured at 1 year after surgery.
primary_outcome.measure: compare  the functionality of the knee after installation of a total knee replacement between the 2 groups

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: to assess knee function by autoquestionnaire KOOS, the KSS knee score, operative time, procedure bleeding, reliability of the ancillary

secondary_outcome.description:
Compare the costs of implementing the two strategies (A and B) taking into account the resources consumed (operative time, anesthetic drugs, blood bags ...).
Determine the least costly therapeutic intervention and medico-economic impact in the current system of financing of hospital expenditure.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Health Services Research
